attributes.action: Request for the Dissolution of Parliament and the Calling of a General Election
attributes.additional_details: UK citizens feel that the current Government no longer represents us. There’s growing frustration and loss of trust. We respectfully ask HIS MAJESTY KING CHARLES III to use his power to dissolve Parliament and call a general election so people can choose new leadership. This is about giving the public a fair chance to decide the future of our country.
attributes.background: We respectfully ask HIS MAJESTY KING CHARLES III to use his power to dissolve Parliament and call a general election

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
